roleset.name: to set up, manipulate,

example.name: rig-v: passive
example.text: The prime minister 's opponents claimed the balloting , 12 votes short of a majority in Islamabad 's 237 - seat assembly , was rigged .

propbank.arg: the balloting , 12 votes short of a majority in Islamabad 's 237 - seat assembly

example.name: rig-n
example.text: It seems that , sometime in the 1830s , one of the alien bureaucrats messed up the election rig .

roleset.note: RIG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rig' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from rig.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: rig_up-v: transitive
example.text: After discovering that the hacker had taken over the dormant account of a legitimate user named Joe Sventek , he rigged up an alarm system , including a portable beeper , to alert him when Sventek came on the line .

propbank.arg: After discovering that the hacker had taken over the dormant account of a legitimate user named Joe Sventek
an alarm system , including a portable beeper , to alert him when Sventek came on the line
